The user will be able to change the settings of their smart remote on this page!

You will be able to decide what remote commands you want to correspond to what gesture. For example, you can access the menu with a swipe to the right or bring up recordings with a flick of your wrist.
You will also be able to edit you favorites page and set alarms to remind you when your favorite shows are playing.
You will be able to access all of your recordings from this page!

Gesture control gives you the ability to control your television from the palm of your hand!
Try flicking your remote to the left to replay that awesome play that you just saw.
Or try pointing the remote to the floor to turn off your set-top box.
